    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static NetworkModule getInstance(Context context,
                                        NetworkCallback networkCallback)

      • processPayloadQueue

        public void processPayloadQueue()
        Method that loops through the payloadQueueList and triggers a onBytePayloadReceived callback on each one and then removes it. When completed it sets isQueuingIncomingPayloads to false
        Specified by:
        processPayloadQueue in interface NetworkManager

      • clearPayloadQueue

        public void clearPayloadQueue()
        Method that clears the payloadQueueList and sets isQueuingIncomingPayloads to false
        Specified by:
        clearPayloadQueue in interface NetworkManager

      • startScan

        public void startScan()
        Method that starts the discovering process of other Nearby Connection endpoints in the close proximity. Stops any ongoing advertising.
        Specified by:
        startScan in interface NetworkManager

      • stopScan

        public void stopScan()
        Method that stops the discovering process of other Nearby Connection endpoints
        Specified by:
        stopScan in interface NetworkManager

      • connectToHost

        public void connectToHost(Connection connection)
        Method used to connect to an advertising device
        Specified by:
        connectToHost in interface NetworkManager
        Parameters:
        connection - Connection that holds the details of the endpoint

      • startHostBeacon

        public void startHostBeacon()
        Method used to start advertising your host endpoint to other devices in the close proximity. Will mark the session as host, call stopAllConnection() to reset this. During a host session any discovering is not allowed due to risk communication interference.
        Specified by:
        startHostBeacon in interface NetworkManager

      • stopHostBeacon

        public void stopHostBeacon()
        Method used to stop an ongoing endpoint advertising. Does not allow any clients to connect when host beacon is off
        Specified by:
        stopHostBeacon in interface NetworkManager

      • sendBytePayload

        public void sendBytePayload(Connection connection,
                            byte[] payload)
        Method used to send a byte[] payload to a given connection
        Specified by:
        sendBytePayload in interface NetworkManager
        Parameters:
        connection - Connection with the details of the target endpoint
        payload - byte[] with the content to send

      • stopAllConnections

        public void stopAllConnections()
        Method to disconnect with every connected endpoint and also stops endpoint scanning and the hosting beacon.
        Specified by:
        stopAllConnections in interface NetworkManager

      • cleanStop

        public void cleanStop()
        Method used to clean up and release network resources. Intended to be called upon when resetting the networkModule as well as when the service is no longer needed
        Specified by:
        cleanStop in interface NetworkManager
